title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, April 6, 2020
description: It's the birthday of country songwriter and singer Merle Haggard (1937), who wrote more than 600 songs in his lifetime, including about forty #1 hits.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of country songwriter and singer Merle Haggard (1937), who wrote more than 600 songs in his lifetime, including about forty #1 hits.
